entry.title: Ukraine's New Foreign Legion Takes the Fight to Russian Forces
entry.content: A combination of international arms and foreign volunteers has joined Ukraine’s efforts to impede the Russian advance three weeks into the conflict, and are now playing a growing role as the fighting spreads.

entry.title: Ukraine Is a World Leader in Surrogacy, but Babies Are Now Stranded in a War Zone
entry.content: In the basement beneath one apartment block in Kyiv, 19 newborns lie in plastic cots, their cries mingling with the blare of air raid sirens warning of incoming Russian strikes.

entry.title: Russian Strikes Intensify Near Kyiv as Ukraine's President Foresees 'New Stage of Terror'
entry.content: Cruise missiles slammed into an airport south of Kyiv, setting fire to an oil terminal and an ammunition depot, while Russian strikes also hit suburbs to the east and west.
